page.title: 01Mellerstain Estate
page.content: The block is divided by the Eden Water, flowing south. To the west lie the tenanted farms belonging to Mellerstain Estate, the property of Lord Bining, heir to the 12th Earl of Heddington. The farms in this section of the estate are Lightfield, Cottergoks and the Mellerstain Home Farm. Close to Mellerstain House, an 18th Century 'Adam' Mansion lies the village of Mellerstain, housing Estate, Farm and Retired workers. To the east of the village is the Old School, now closed, following the fall in population of the area. Mellerstain is surrounded by a park enclosing ornamental deciduous trees. The remainder of the block to the east of the river is part of the farms of East Gordon and Hardies Mill Place, and is flatter and virtually treeless, being prime arable land.
